A Few Words About Us

Colombo Cabs private limited is a registered cab service started since 2008. We provide solutions to passenger transport requirements with vans cars and busses. Our main aim is to give our customers the most convenient and comfortable service throughout their journey and not stopping by that but to keep our customers satisfied and be loyal to them in the future too providing the required quality service.

Why Choose Us?

  • We offer the best prices.
  • We offer a reliable service.
  • Our service is open 24-7.
  • We always ensure your comfort and safety.
Our Vision

"To accept the challenges posed by the modern day traveling hassles and to see ourselves as the top destination for and any kind of travel needs of all class of people by offering them effortless journey at affordable rates and making them our life-long customers in the process."

Our Mission

"To provide comfortable and luxurious ride to our customers in the cleanest, fastest and safest service with the most honest and transparent system of dealing, thereby creating a value system for ourselves and gaining the goodwill and respect of our customers."
